mapper.select: select FirstName, MiddleName, LastName, FirstName_kana, MiddleName_kana, LastName_kana, PlatformId, LanguageId, Status, TimeZone, ConfirmedVersionNoOfTerms, ConfirmedVersionNoOfPolicy from odr_users where Email = #{email} AND password = #{passWord} AND DeleteFlag = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE odr_users SET LastLoginDate = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE Email = #{email} AND password = #{passWord} AND DeleteFlag = 0
